replies.body:
10 games tracked.

OCE isn't supported by this.

I just did a huge list with this site

Yours is "passable" lol

The problem is it goes off a smaller sample of games then realistically available in OCE, meaning the numbers are sporadic at best.

Example: Support 17.8 for me.

likelihood is either it did like 1 really short game, or this was a surrender at 20.

I just did a check of all my support games on OP.GG and i average about 23ish wards.

Sure it's not far off, but it shows that this site realistically doesn't work for OCE to the standard it does for NA.

Then how did I track my OCE account with it? And yeah, 10 games is a small sample size but that's beside the point, my warding in any set of 10 games isn't any better than that. Ward less, get better baddies.
getting the nexus wins game you baddies

I found a bronzy with an "excessive" warding score.

He is still in bronze

WHAT THE. GOOD? NAH NOT GOOD ENOUGH *commits sodoku*
http://wardscore.loltools.net/?name=flood&region=oce
Is this a website? Can I have a link if it is?

http://wardscore.loltools.net

Ward more than 96% of supports lol k.
